backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that stores products and orders, providing CRUD-style queries and order placement with basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, mapping paths to short descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables and light/dark mode color palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, page title, and loading the root React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with CartProvider.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state, persistence, and operations like add, update, and remove.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing cart data in localStorage with versioning and bigint serialization.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Type definitions for cart items and cart state.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the handmade crafts logo image with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/CategoryIcon.tsx: Renders a category-specific sprite icon via background positioning.
frontend/src/components/CategoryNav.tsx: Provides category filter buttons with optional icons for catalog browsing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, and a copyright line referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the main navigation bar with site branding, links, and a cart button showing item count.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall page layout with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info and image with add‑to‑cart support and link to product detail page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Supplies product and order data hooks using the backend actor, including fetching products and placing orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for the handmade crafts design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page with item management, quantity updates, and cart totals.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows the product catalog with category filtering, product listings, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, validates buyer info, submits orders for each cart item, and redirects to confirmation after clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero section, category cards, and featured products fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details using the orderId param, including buyer info and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product details with image, description, price, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths for styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, known issues, and image asset expectations.
